description: This planet reeks of war and fear. You can feel a cold running down your legs
You see the broken and ruined shelters in the distance... Something terrible happened here.
Wake up captain. Time to experience hell again.
The dust and grime make its way to your suit. You feel as if you're being watched
You trip and stumble all the way to the bunker. Dense, grey fog covers your screen.
The air here is thick. Pungent. Wicked.
This is probably the most disgusting planet in this solar system.
They say you can see faces staring back in the distance
